metadata.title: CVE-2021-32477 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: The last time a user accessed the mobile app is displayed on their profilepage, but should be restricted to users with the relevant capability (siteadministrators by default). Moodle versions 3.10 to 3.10.3 are affected.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
